description: Southern Province -Summoning the 1st Session of 7th Southern Province Provincial Council to meet on 20.05.2014 - Appointing Hon. Haththotuwa Gamage Weerasumana Weerasinghe as the Minister of Rural Development and Hon. Udalamaththa Gamage Dayawansha Ariyathilaka as the Minister of Trade in addition to other subjects - Appointing Mr. Chinthaka S. Lokuhetti as Secretary to the Ministry of Rural Development and Mr. Sumith Alahakoon as Acting Secretary to the Ministry of Trade in addition to other subjects
